text: @daveks88 The only Chelsea game I attended was the one where Zola got tactically subbed after you had a player sent off in the 1st half {we won 4-1}, sometime in the late 90s. I was in Kop pretty much middle. I don’t know how old that chant is but I don’t remember hearing it. I wouldn’t...
